text: Monitor all your trackers in one place!
We support an ever growing list of trackers.

items.title: Real time updates
items.text: See your trackers move around the map in realtime, no need to refresh the page.

items.title: Trip History
items.text: Trip history is stored by Ten20. It's up to you how long you keep your trips for.

items.title: Set your own virtual fence
items.text: Get alerts via SMS, email, Facebook or Twitter when tracker enters an area you draw on the map.

items.title: GOTOP-206
items.text: Portable GPS tracker from GOTOP Limited
